Title: Allows individuals to register in the donate life registry through mandatory personal income tax electronic tax filings
Summary: Allows individuals to register in the "donate life registry" on any mandatory electronic personal income tax filing.
LawCode: Amd ยง4310, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to allowing individuals to register in the "donate life registry" through mandatory electronic personal income tax filings
